original_text: “The priest who is chief among his brothers, on whose head the anointing oil is poured and who has been consecrated to wear the garments, shall not let the hair of his head hang loose nor tear his clothes.
korean_text: 자기의 형제 중 관유로 부음을 받고 위임되어 그 예복을 입은 대제사장은 그의 머리를 풀지 말며 그의 옷을 찢지 말며

sentences.original_text: The priest who is chief among his brothers,
on whose head the anointing oil is poured
and who has been consecrated to wear the garments,
shall not let the hair of his head hang loose
